thread.title: Microsoft details November’s redesigned, backward compatibility-adding Xbox One update
thread.title_full: Microsoft details November’s redesigned, backward compatibility-adding Xbox One update - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft details November’s redesigned, backward compatibility-adding Xbox One update
text: Your Xbox One is going to have a lot of new features soon. Microsoft detailed on Xbox Wire everything it’s adding to the console via a November system update. Notably, the Xbox One will support backward compatibility with over 100 Xbox 360 games. You’ll be able to use Xbox One features like live-streaming and screenshot-taking […] »
